description: Covered Vessel; Unknown maker, Façon de Venise, possibly the Glashütte of Wolfgang Vitl (Austrian, active 1534 - 1540); Hall, Austria; about 1536 - 1540; Free-blown colorless (slightly purplish-gray) glass with applied decoration, gilding, and cold painted decoration; 19.1 cm (7 1/2 in.); 84.DK.548; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California

medium: Free-blown colorless (slightly purplish-gray) glass with applied decoration, gilding, and cold painted decoration
